20-042EC.summary: Recommendation to appoint additional Independent Redistricting Commission members randomly selected from the applicant subpool by the Ethics Commission Chair, subject to the completion of the remaining City requirements.Page 1 of 3TELECONFERENCE, 4:30 PMWEDNESDAY, OCTOBER 21, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHETHICS COMMISSION MINUTESChair Wise spoke.Jonathan Nagayama, City Clerk Analyst, spoke.Chair Wise spoke.Vice Chair Morales spoke.A motion was made by Vice Chair Morales, seconded by Commissioner Maniquis, to approve motion to accept the withdrawal of applicant CD2-38, conduct a random selection from the applicant subpool, and appoint the randomly selected applicant CD2-21 to the Independent Redistricting Commission.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 7 - Lani De Benedictis, Luke Fiedler, Kimmy Maniquis, Barbara Pollack, J. P. Shotwell, Margo Morales and Susan Wise2.
